personal.name: Jose Gabriel Verutti Narvaez
personal.title: Web Developer
personal.description:
Full Stack Web Developer graduated from the Universidad Autónoma de Occidente, passionate about programming and software development. I have completed over 17 specialized courses in backend development and artificial intelligence. In 2021, I won the first MinTIC hackathon with my project Motzi. 

 I have developed corporate applications, intranets, and web portals, managing both frontend and backend to meet my clients' needs. My professional approach is based on efficient problem-solving, even outside my main areas of expertise, showcasing my adaptability and continuous learning ability.

experience.title: Consultant Developer
experience.description: I work as a consultant developer, helping companies to build and improve their digital products and services. I focus on creating user-friendly interfaces, optimizing performance, and ensuring a seamless user experience. My expertise includes React, TypeScript, Angular, .Net Framework, Power Automate, and Azure Services.

experience.title: Backend Profesor
experience.description: I was a backend professor at PONAO, teaching programming and web development. I created a curriculum that covered topics such as Python, FastAPI, AWS, and SQL. I also taught other subjects such as data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming.

projects.title: Agencia Nacional de Mineria (ANM)
projects.description: I worked on the ANM project, where I developed an Intranet and a Portal for the organization. Some of the technologies we used included Drupal, SharePoint, Docker, and Azure Services.

projects.title: Loteria del cauca
projects.description: I worked on the Lotería del Cauca project, where I developed a web application for ticket purchases and also created the admin site. Some of the technologies we used included React, TypeScript, Angular, .NET Framework, SQL Server, and Azure Services.

projects.title: LLM RAG Asistant
projects.description: I have developed a text review assistant for the LLM RAG project, leveraging OpenAI's GPT-3 model and Pinecone. This assistant performs text analysis and research to provide context-based responses derived from uploaded documents. The project was implemented using Python, OpenAI's API, Pinecone, and the Transformers library.

projects.title: Posture Tracker
projects.description: I have developed a posture tracking application utilizing Python, MediaPipe, and TensorFlow. The system employs MediaPipe to detect and analyze body posture by identifying key landmarks, while TensorFlow is used to train a model that assesses posture quality. The application provides users with feedback reports to help improve their posture and includes reminders to encourage regular activity breaks.
